duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical leadership and strategy on the HS4TB project, focusing on health systems and financing in TB elimination.
Lead technical guidance and capacity building for government contracting, private sector partnerships, and funding mechanisms for sustainable financing for TB.
Supervise in-country technical teams and mentor them to produce high-quality deliverables and thought leadership products.
Develop strategic plans for growing the business portfolio for MSH in the practice area.
Ensure strong representation of MSH to local, regional, and global partners in the practice area.
Establish and manage collaborative relationships with USAID and other stakeholders.
Lead stakeholder engagement and facilitate high-level stakeholder roundtables or fora.
Participate in industry conferences and workshops to represent MSH and engage new audiences.
Suggest and implement new methods to achieve the desired project outcomes.

education_certification.credential: Advanced graduate degree (Masters level or above) in economics, medicine, public health, management, or related fields.
